description: Surrogate primary key for the email template record; uniquely identifies a row.
Business-facing identifier or label for the template (e.g., request type or subject); values may be friendly names or technical keys; confirm exact usage with SME.
Flag indicating whether this is the default template for its request category (1=true, 0=false).
Email body template text, potentially with placeholders/tokens populated from request data.
Technical name/code of the template used by application logic or file references.
System timestamp of the most recent change to this template record.
Narrative summary of the templateâ€™s purpose or usage.
Identifier of the user who created the template record (audit).
Timestamp when the template record was created (audit).
Identifier of the user who last modified the template record (audit).
Timestamp when a user last modified the template record (audit; may overlap with last_modified); confirm with SME.
